annoGroup.heading: History

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see ยง 2072(b) of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
